metrics_conclusion: Hammer Stirrup and Anvil has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Hammer Stirrup and Anvil has sections analyzed in the following keys: F♯ Minor,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
